display.title: Creating a Spell Altar
display.description: An End Spawner Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, 4 Enchanting Tables, 3 pieces of Crying Obsidian & End Crystal onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 4x Enchanting Table 3x Crying Obsidian 1x End Crystal | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
